title: La Pluie
marks: Signature Signature in plate and in pencil
text: Although Gaston de Latenay studied briefly at the Academie Julian in Paris, he was mostly self-taught. He had a long and successful career as a painter, lithographer, and etcher, and developed his own artistic vision apart from the various art movements of the day. However, his remarkable marine studies as well as his understanding of light-effects in the sky, storms, and rain influenced many Impressionist artists.
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
